items.label: Scholarship Database
items.summary: Curated listings of scholarships for Iowa military-connected youth.
items.notes: Acknowledgments: Emily Williams (Military Youth & Family Support VISTA) and Kristen Ferullo (Navy School Liaison) for their collaboration.

items.label: Iowa National Guard Mobile App (iOS)
items.summary: Download the Iowa National Guard mobile app for iPhone to access news, events, and resources.
items.notes: Ensure App Store badge follows branding.

items.label: Iowa National Guard Mobile App (Android)
items.summary: Download the Iowa National Guard mobile app for Android to stay connected with updates and tools.
items.notes: Verify Google Play badge assets are current.

items.label: Tutor.com (Military)
items.summary: 24/7 online tutoring and homework help for military families.
items.notes: Note any usage rights for screenshots or logos.

items.label: Military OneSource
items.summary: Comprehensive support services for military members and families.
items.notes: Check if a youth-program subpage is preferred.

items.label: American Red Cross - Military Families
items.summary: Programs and services supporting military families through the American Red Cross.
items.notes: Confirm link anchors correctly on mobile.

items.label: BGCA Mission Youth Outreach
items.summary: Boys & Girls Clubs programming tailored to military-connected youth.
items.notes: Add primary BGCA military page if needed.

items.label: Child Care Aware (Army)
items.summary: Child care fee assistance and respite programs for Army families.
items.notes: Monitor for URL updates each fiscal year.

items.label: Hy-Vee KidsFit
items.summary: Wellness challenges and resources for youth and families from Hy-Vee KidsFit.
items.notes: Request partner logo approval if highlighted.

items.label: Our Military Kids
items.summary: Activity grants supporting children of deployed Guard and Reserve members.
items.notes: Capture any application deadlines in notes.

items.label: ARNG Child & Youth Services
items.summary: National Guard Child & Youth Services hub for programs and resources.
items.notes: Confirm regional contacts referenced on site.

items.label: Iowa National Guard Warrior & Family Services
items.summary: Comprehensive services and support for Iowa Guard members and families.
items.notes: Check for deeper links to specific services.

items.label: Upwards Drill-Time Child Care
items.summary: Pilot program providing no-cost childcare for military families during drill weekends and battle assemblies.

items.label: Crisis Text Line
items.summary: Free, 24/7, confidential text-based mental health support for anyone in crisis. Text HELLO to 741741 to connect with a trained Crisis Counselor.
items.notes: Verify inclusion of text number (741741) and ensure ADA-compliant contrast on graphics.
